localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: https://www.wingspan.app/ erases all the worst parts of freelancing– taxes, benefits, accounting, invoice & expense tracking, registering an LLC, even your tax withholdings. The ease and beauty of a payroll platform, but optimized for freelancers and independent professionals.
blogPost.body: https://www.wingspan.app/ erases all the worst parts of freelancing– taxes, benefits, accounting, invoice & expense tracking, registering an LLC, even your tax withholdings. The ease and beauty of a payroll platform, but optimized for freelancers and independent professionals.
blogPost.title: Wingspan - Invoices, benefits, and taxes for independent professionals
blogPost.author: Nick Abouzeid

localize.description: https://www.wingspan.app/ 抹去了自由职业者所有最糟糕的部分--税收、福利、会计、发票和费用跟踪、注册有限责任公司，甚至是您的预扣税。薪资平台的易用性和美观性，但针对自由职业者和独立专业人士进行了优化。
localize.tagline: 独立专业人员的发票、福利和税金。

localize.description: https://www.wingspan.app/ 抹去了自由職業者所有最糟糕的部分--稅收、福利、會計、發票和費用跟蹤、註冊有限責任公司，甚至是您的預扣稅。薪資平臺的易用性和美觀性，但針對自由職業者和獨立專業人士進行了優化。
localize.tagline: 獨立專業人員的發票、福利和稅金。

previous.excerpt: Around is a lightweight video collaboration tool that floats on your desktop, perfect for things like design sessions, brainstorms, and code reviews. Available for download. Now comes with EchoTerminator.
previous.title: Around 2.0 - Video calls for the future of hybrid-remote work

localize.description: Around是一个轻量级的视频协作工具，漂浮在你的桌面上，非常适合设计会议、头脑风暴和代码审查等。可供下载。现在附带EchoTerminator。
localize.tagline: 视频呼唤混合-远程工作的未来。

localize.description: Around是一個輕量級的視頻協作工具，漂浮在你的桌面上，非常適合設計會議、頭腦風暴和代碼審查等。可供下載。現在附帶EchoTerminator。
localize.tagline: 視頻呼喚混合-遠程工作的未來。

next.excerpt: Vidjet is a smart video player for websites. It uses a popup format to display videos, so you can segment and trigger them to your visitors. ⠀ It's also the easiest and fastest way to publish videos on a website! 🚀
next.title: Vidjet - Popup-video player for websites

localize.description: Vidjet是一款适用于网站的智能视频播放器。它使用弹出式格式来显示视频，因此您可以将视频分割并触发给您的访问者。⠀这也是在网站上发布视频的最简单、最快速的方式！ ⠀这也是在网站上发布视频的最简单、最快速的方式。🚀
localize.tagline: 网站的弹出式视频播放器

localize.description: Vidjet是一款適用於網站的智能視頻播放器。它使用彈出式格式來顯示視頻，因此您可以將視頻分割並觸發給您的訪問者。⠀這也是在網站上發佈視頻的最簡單、最快速的方式！ ⠀這也是在網站上發佈視頻的最簡單、最快速的方式。🚀
localize.tagline: 網站的彈出式視頻播放器
